short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Button: toggle listening to "Radio Veronica"

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple one button solution to listen to the Radio Veronica (NL) audio stream in browser. This will play with the click of a button without the need of browsing to the Veronica website and launch a separate player window there.
